overview: From 2025-06-29 to 2025-07-06, ethereum-optimism/op-geth had 1 new PRs (0 merged), 0 new issues, and 6 active contributors.

topPRs.title: all: merge go-ethereum v1.16.1
topPRs.author: 0x00101010
topPRs.body:
**Description**

Merges in go-ethereum v1.16.1 changes.

Corresponding monorepo PR: https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/pull/16785

Cleaned-up git history PR is at https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/op-geth/pull/652

**Additional context**

* Had to kinda "revert" https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/pull/32021, the PR introduced changes to load / read receipt individually without reading the whole block to speed things up. However due to the way L2 blocks are constructed (with L1 attributes), we have to load all transactions to be able to derive all the necessary information.
* https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/pull/31427 introduces always removing empty accounts from pre state, in the spirit of minimal diff with upstrea, I elected to change the optimism.json file to match the latest output (with no pre-states for empty acount)

topContributors.summary: 0x00101010: Focused on dependency maintenance this week, opening a pull request to merge `go-ethereum v1.16.1` into the `op-geth` repository (ethereum-optimism/op-geth#638).
cshein45: Contributed to documentation processes by opening an issue in ethereum-optimism/docs (#1675) to suggest an improvement for PR titles.
